feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:19 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -19.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: -19.7°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -21.9°C
Wind: NW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning near noon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 60 early this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Blowing snow this evening. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 after midnight then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
